title: JAM ORB / logic orb
description: logic afterthought about the humanitarian guy being all suspicious and whatnot

dialogueTree.title: Logic: "You were right. That streethawker r..."
dialogueTree.text: You were right. That streethawker really *was* stealing from the back of his own truck.

links.title: You: ""Humanox... This stands for humanit..."
links.text: "Humanox... This stands for humanitarian aid, right?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes," nods the lieutenant, "Humano..."
links.text: "Yes," nods the lieutenant, "Humanox is a well-known humanitarian aid organization. It must be the streethawker's truck."

links.title: You: ""Did you see that, Kim? It must be..."
links.text: "Did you see that, Kim? It must be Siileng's truck."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good to know that we were right,"..."
links.text: "Good to know that we were right," the lieutenant remarks dryly. "Would have *sucked* to rip a man off for no reason at all."

links.title: You: ""Oh my god, I'm a legit genius. Her..."
links.text: "Oh my god, I'm a legit genius. Here's proof that Siileng really was selling stolen goods!"

links.title: You: "Great! I'm smart."
links.text: Great! I'm smart.

links.title: Logic: "Atta boy!"
links.text: Atta boy!

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]

dialogueTree.title: Logic: "Someone here is stealing from a com..."
dialogueTree.text: Someone here is stealing from a company called Humanox.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you see that?" The lieutenant..."
links.text: "Did you see that?" The lieutenant nods towards the vehicle. "The seals on the humanitarian aid lorry have been broken off."

links.title: You: ""I have a feeling Siileng's involve..."
links.text: "I have a feeling Siileng's involved in this."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You may be right. Let's see what h..."
links.text: "You may be right. Let's see what he's got to say."

links.title: You: ""Looks like someone's stealing.""
links.text: "Looks like someone's stealing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You may be right," he agrees, scan..."
links.text: "You may be right," he agrees, scanning the jam. "Let's keep our eyes open."

links.title: You: ""I did see it, yes. Let's better no..."
links.text: "I did see it, yes. Let's better not jump to any conclusion."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, absolutely," he agrees, while..."
links.text: "Yes, absolutely," he agrees, while his eyes turn to the traffic jam. "But I suggest we keep our eyes open around that streethawker we met before."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, absolutely," the lieutenant a..."
links.text: "Yes, absolutely," the lieutenant agrees, while his eyes scan the traffic jam. "But let's keep our eyes open nevertheless."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Humanox is a non-profit humanitaria..."
links.text: Humanox is a non-profit humanitarian aid organization created by EPIS countries to provide assistance during humanitarian crises.

links.title: You: "Okay-do. What's EPIS, though?"
links.text: Okay-do. What's EPIS, though?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Now that I start to think about it..."
links.text: Now that I start to think about it I'm not even sure it was EPIS... maybe it was ECIS, or ETIS? Maybe your brain just made this letter combination up to sound more professional. Kiddo, it's a mystery.

links.title: You: "I don't believe you."
links.text: I don't believe you.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Then don't."
links.text: Then don't.

links.title: You: "Okay. But what am I supposed to do..."
links.text: Okay. But what am I supposed to do about it?

links.title: Logic: "Uh, dunno. Nothing, I guess. It's n..."
links.text: Uh, dunno. Nothing, I guess. It's not like there's something you can do, you're but a mere cop.

links.title: You: "Cool. Thieves. I should catch them."
links.text: Cool. Thieves. I should catch them.

links.title: Logic: "That's what a cop does, isn't it? K..."
links.text: That's what a cop does, isn't it? Keep your eyes peeled... crime is close by.

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]
